title: Getting Started with Apper
description: Learn what Apper is and how it helps you create amazing applications without coding

content.content: Welcome to Apper Academy! Apper is a revolutionary platform that lets anyone create professional applications without writing code. Whether you're a business owner, designer, or entrepreneur, Apper transforms your ideas into working applications through an intuitive visual interface.
Click the 'Create New Project' button to experience how easy it is to start building with Apper

As you just experienced, Apper makes application creation accessible to everyone. You simply describe what you want, drag and drop components, and Apper handles all the technical complexity behind the scenes.

exercises.question: In your own words, what is the main benefit of using Apper for creating applications?
exercises.hint: Think about how Apper removes technical barriers and makes app creation accessible to everyone.

title: Creating Your First Project
description: Learn how to start a new project and explore Apper's workspace

content.content: Now that you understand what Apper does, let's create your first project. Apper's project wizard guides you through choosing the right template and customizing it for your needs. Whether you're building a website, mobile app, or web application, there's a template to get you started.
Try creating a project: Choose 'Business Website' template and give it a name
Great! You've just created your first project. Notice how Apper automatically set up a professional-looking structure with pages, navigation, and sample content that you can customize.

exercises.question: What type of project template would you choose for an online store?
exercises.hint: Think about what type of business sells products online.

title: Understanding Apper's Interface
description: Master the main workspace and learn where everything is located

content.content: Apper's interface is designed to be intuitive and powerful. The main workspace consists of several key areas: the Canvas (where you design), the Components Panel (building blocks), the Properties Panel (customization options), and the Pages Panel (site structure).
Take a tour of the interface: Click on each panel to see what it contains
The interface adapts to your workflow - panels can be resized, moved, or hidden based on what you're working on. Everything is designed to keep your most-used tools within easy reach.

exercises.question: Which panel would you use to change the color of a button you've added to your page?
exercises.hint: Think about where you would go to customize or modify the appearance of an element.

title: Using Apper's Design Tools
description: Learn how to customize layouts, colors, and styling without design experience

content.content: One of Apper's greatest strengths is making professional design accessible to everyone. The visual design tools let you customize colors, fonts, layouts, and spacing with simple clicks and sliders. No design experience needed!
Customize a page: Change the background color and try different font combinations
Notice how Apper automatically ensures your design choices work well together. It suggests complementary colors, readable font pairings, and maintains proper spacing for a professional look.

exercises.question: How does Apper help ensure your design looks professional even if you're not a designer?
exercises.hint: Think about the helpful recommendations Apper provides when you make design choices.

title: Adding Interactive Features
description: Discover how to make your application dynamic with forms, buttons, and user interactions

content.content: Static pages are just the beginning. Apper lets you add interactive features like contact forms, user registration, shopping carts, and more. These features work automatically - no technical setup required.
Add a contact form to your page and see how Apper automatically handles form submissions
When users submit your forms, Apper can automatically send emails, save to databases, integrate with other services, or trigger custom actions. You just choose what you want to happen.

exercises.question: What happens when someone fills out a contact form you created in Apper?
exercises.hint: Think about how you would want to be notified when someone contacts you through your website.

title: Managing Content and Data
description: Learn how to organize and update your application's content easily

content.content: Apper makes content management simple. Whether you're updating text, adding images, or managing a product catalog, everything can be done through the friendly content editor. Changes appear instantly, and you can preview how they'll look to your users.
Update your homepage content and add some images from the media library
The content management system automatically optimizes images, maintains backups, and ensures everything loads quickly for your users. You focus on your content, Apper handles the technical details.

exercises.question: What are the benefits of using Apper's built-in content management versus editing files manually?
exercises.hint: Think about the technical tasks Apper handles automatically when you update content.

title: Collaborating with Your Team
description: Discover how to work together on projects and manage permissions

content.content: Apper makes team collaboration seamless. You can invite team members, assign different permission levels, and work together in real-time. See changes as they happen and communicate directly within the platform.
Invite a team member and explore the collaboration features

Team permissions ensure the right people have access to the right features. Designers can focus on visuals, content creators can update text, and administrators can manage settings - all without stepping on each other's toes.

exercises.question: What are the main benefits of real-time collaboration in Apper?
exercises.hint: Think about how working together in real-time improves team productivity and coordination.

title: Organizing Your Workspace
description: Learn best practices for keeping your projects organized and efficient

content.content: As your projects grow, staying organized becomes crucial. Apper provides tools to help you structure your work effectively: project folders, page organization, component libraries, and naming conventions that make sense.
Organize your project by creating folders and grouping related pages together
Good organization saves time and reduces confusion. When you can quickly find what you're looking for, you spend more time creating and less time searching.

exercises.question: Why is it important to organize your projects well from the beginning?
exercises.hint: Think about what happens when projects grow larger and more complex over time.

title: Publishing and Sharing Your Work
description: Learn how to make your application live and share it with the world

content.content: Creating your application is just the beginning - Apper makes it easy to share your work with the world. Whether you want to publish to the web, share preview links with clients, or create mobile app versions, it's all built-in.
Generate a preview link for your project and see how easy sharing can be

Publishing options include custom domains, built-in hosting, app store submission assistance, and analytics to track how your application performs. Apper handles the technical infrastructure so you can focus on your users.

exercises.question: What's the difference between a preview link and publishing your application?
exercises.hint: Think about when you'd want to show work-in-progress versus making something public and permanent.

title: Advanced Tips and Productivity Hacks
description: Master time-saving techniques and advanced features to work more efficiently

content.content: Once you're comfortable with the basics, these advanced techniques will supercharge your productivity. Learn keyboard shortcuts, template creation, bulk operations, and workflow automation that experienced users rely on.
Try some keyboard shortcuts and explore the advanced features menu
The most successful Apper users develop efficient workflows that let them iterate quickly and focus on creativity rather than repetitive tasks. These techniques will help you join their ranks.

exercises.question: Name three ways you can save time when working on large projects in Apper.
exercises.hint: Think about features that help you avoid repeating the same actions over and over.
